Articles.Content:
Just some real life inspired missions and spacecrafts i tried to recreate in KSP

Mercury Program - First Kerbal in Space. Stock except for MJ. It was already late in the night and i was too lazy and tired to do it manually

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Gemini Program - using KWRocketry (i love this pack) and MJ, but was flown manually.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Apollo 11 - First Moon Landing. Stock except for MJ. But was only used for SmartASS and Info Displays. Sadly i lost some of the original screenshots and i had to replay the launch, hence the wrong crew.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Voyager 1 - Deep Space Probe. Uses KWRocketry Parts and DamnedRobotics for the unfolding Magnetometer boom.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Very cool UmlÃƒÂ¼x! You know what'd be cool that I don't think I've seen done before? An Apollo 13 recreation where you have to use the lander module engines to get back home. You could use a decoupled to make an explosion!
Nice, but on your Apollo mission - "out of fuel"? Bah! You still had almost all of your monopropellant, enough to cover 2 km easy!
